titles.title: A bill to increase the authorized number of Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Teams.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/16/2012--Introduced. Amends the Bob Stump National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year to establish a minimum of 25 (under current law, 23) Weapons of Mass Destruction Civil Support Teams for a total of 57 (under current law, 55) Teams.
